attributes.action: NEVER repeal laws which protect freedom on lifestyle choices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
While signing petitions I have noticed a LOT which express (sometimes VIRULENTLY) anti-choice views on various lifestyles.  The main issues which seem to be raised are sexuality and choice on abortion.  These are both perfectly legal but anti-choice people (who are not affected by them personally to any extent but simply hold prejudiced views!) constantly attempt to change this; I ask the Prime Minister to ensure that it never happens.

I understand that SEXUALITY is innate; i.e it is beyond an individual's control.  I admit that homosexuals and Lesbians sometimes proposition, or even attack, others but so do HETEROSEXUALS and I don't see any petitions (even from rape victims) asking for HETEROSEXUALITY to be made illegal.

As far as ABORTION is concerned a foetus is only a POTENTIALLY unborn child; it could be miscarried or stillborn. Do anti-abortion campaigners campaign against, e.g., smoking in pregnancy which can cause both these outcomes?  Do they campaign, equally vigorously, against people who KILL THEIR ALREADY-EXISTING CHILDREN; including men who KILL THEIR CHILDREN TO PUNISH THEIR PARTNERS?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
